channel.title: training on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in training on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: OONI Partner Training 2021
item.description: Image: 1st OONI Partner Training, 28th-30th June 2021 Image: 2nd OONI Partner Training, 5th-7th July 2021 Over the last week, we had the pleasure to host two 3-day OONI Partner Training events for our partners in Africa, Latin America, the Middle East, and Asia. As part of these events, our goal was to share OONI-specific knowledge and skills, and to collect feedback to better serve community needs.
